sentences: The sister-in-law of Hayden, Canon worked as an elementary school teacher, pursuing music on the side as a hobby, until one year Hayden gave her some time in his home recording studio as a Christmas gift.
The sessions resulted in her debut album, which was released in 2011 on Hayden's Hardwood Records.
Canon also appears as a guest vocalist on Hayden's 2013 album Us Alone, and toured with him on several concert dates to support the album.
In January 2022 she released Reimagine the Body, a six-track EP of songs from Audomatic Body remixed by Ã‰poque Selector, Graham Walsh, July Talk, Lido Pimienta, Witch Prophet and Zoon.
